data.title: Soccer Player Profile: Lionel Messi
data.text:
achievements:

Lionel Messi won the Ballon d'Or award a record eight times: in 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2015, 2019, 2021 & 2023.

Lionel Messi won the FIFA Player of the Year in 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2015, 2019.

won L'Ãquipe Champion of Champions award in 2011.

Golden Ball winner 2014 World Cup

Laureus World Sportsman of the Year Award in 2020 and 2023

what you may not know:

At the age of five, Messi started playing football for Grandoli, a local club coached by his father Jorge.

He was diagnosed with a growth deficiency at 11, requiring growth hormone injections.

He is featured on the front cover of the video game Pro Evolution Soccer 2009.

His debut with the Argentinian national team (against Hungary) was a disaster: he entered the game in the 18th minute of the second half, and 47 seconds later was sent off!

He made his La Liga debut for Barcelona against Espanyol when he was 17 years old
